items.title: Spelfout in PSV-banner blijkt reclamestunt
items.summary: Een spandoek in Eindhoven heeft voor de nodige opschudding gezorgd. PSV gaf bij het Philips Stadion een mooie boodschap aan de fans, maar een spelfout werd gezien als hint voor een contractverlenging.

items.title: VI Live: Demb√©l√© slaat al heel snel en leep toe in Le Classique
items.summary: Voetballiefhebbers kunnen hun vingers donderdag weer aflikken. Zo speelt het Liverpool van Arne Slot in de Premier League tegen koploper Arsenal, staan Atl√©tico en Real Madrid tegenover elkaar in de halve finale van de Spaanse Supercopa en strijden Paris Saint-Germain en Olympique Marseille om de Franse Supercup. Volg alles in de VI Live.

items.title: Beaton in prime position for PDC Tour Card after quarter-final run at Q-School
items.summary: Steve 'The Adonis' Beaton is in prime position to regain his PDC Tour Card following a superb run to quarter-finals at UK Q-School on Thursday.

items.title: Aanhoudende zorgen en hoopvolle ontwikkelingen bij Fortuna Sittard
items.summary: Op een paar uitzonderingen na die juist net in een flow waren geraakt, haalden de Eredivisie-clubs op het tandvlees de winterstop. Veel tijd om weer op adem te komen, hebben ze alleen niet, want dit weekeinde begint het hele circus alweer. In aanloop naar het cruciale deel van het seizoen maken we bij elke club de balans op, waarbij we wat de volgorde betreft uitgaan van de eerste speelronde van 2026. Deze keer: Fortuna Sittard.

items.title: Arsenal vs Liverpool build-up LIVE!
Koke zet tegen Real Madrid derby-record op zijn naam
items.summary: Atl√©tico Madrid-aanvoerder Koke staat op het punt om Spaanse voetbalgeschiedenis te schrijven. De middenvelder kan donderdagavond de speler met de meeste Madrileense derby's achter zijn naam worden. Koke deelt dat record momenteel met Real Madrid-icoon Sergio Ramos. Hij houdt zich er naar eigen zeggen niet zo mee bezig.

items.title: Sutton's FA Cup third-round predictions v DJ and producer Shadow Child
items.summary: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on DJ and producer Shadow Child - and AI - with his predictions for all 32 FA Cup third-round ties.

items.title: Trinity Rodman headlines USWNT Jan. camp roster
items.summary: Forward Trinity Rodman, who is out of contract with a club, will join the United States women's national team in training camp later this month for the first time since April 2025.

items.title: Mourinho on shock loss: I hope players don't sleep
items.summary: An angry Benfica coach Jose Mourinho hopes his players had a sleepless night after their shock defeat to Braga in the Portuguese Allianz Cup semifinal on Wednesday.

items.title: Spurs boss backs Romero after IG post 'mistake'
items.summary: Tottenham Hotspur manager Thomas Frank has defended captain Cristian Romero after a social media post where he accused people at the club of telling "lies."

items.title: Rosenior unready to coach Chelsea loss at Fulham
items.summary: Liam Rosenior chose not to take charge of Chelsea for the first time in Wednesday's Premier League clash against Fulham because of the "difficult time-frame" between his appointment on Tuesday and the game at Craven Cottage.

items.title: US midfielder Sam Coffey in talks to join Manchester City from Portland Thorns
items.summary: Midfielder given permission to fly to England Transfer talks behind her omission from US squad Manchester City are in advanced talks to sign the United States midfielder Sam Coffey from Portland Thorns, the Guardian understands. The 27-year-old has been granted permission to fly to Manchester to try to finalise the move, which multiple sources have said is close to completion, and could give City a big boost in their quest to win a first Women‚Äôs Super League title since 2016. Continue reading...

items.title: ‚ÄòI hope they don‚Äôt sleep‚Äô: Jos√© Mourinho turns on Benfica players after cup loss
items.summary: Players will stay at club‚Äôs Seixal training ground Benfica lost 3-1 to Braga in League Cup semi-finals Jos√© Mourinho has turned on his Benfica players after the team‚Äôs 3-1 defeat by Braga in the Portuguese League Cup semi-finals, suggesting that the squad would be staying at the club‚Äôs Seixal training base until further notice. ‚ÄúThe players will sleep in Seixal, and on Thursday there is training, and the day after there will be training,‚Äù Mourinho said at his post-match press conference. ‚ÄúWhen we arrive in Seixal, everyone will go to their rooms.‚Äù Continue reading...

items.title: Pepi en voormalig Eredivisie-trio op lijst met Duitse transferflops
items.summary: Ryan Babel, Ricardo Pepi, Alexander Isak en Arkadiusz Milik staan er wat minder goed op in Duitsland dan in Nederland. Voor het (voormalig) Eredivisie-kwartet is een plekje ingeruimd in een lijst waarin wordt teruggeblikt op de grootste mislukte Duitse wintertransfers ooit.

items.title: Football Daily | Celebrating the Premier League‚Äôs unbridled wildness and joyous puerility
items.summary: Sign up now! Sign up now! Sign up now? Sign up now! There‚Äôs been much talk in recent years about moving Premier League games to various parts of the world that do not boast Premier League teams ‚Äì Sheffield, Miami and so on ‚Äì with the stated aim of spreading the gospel, had the gospel been stolen from Jesus and the Four Evangelists, to be bastardised and defiled, to be converted into folding green and then into geopolitical power and influence. By way of total non-sequitur, this year‚Äôs Geopolitics World Cup will be held in Donald Trump‚Äôs America. There was, of course, much anger at this ludicrous plan for many righteous reasons, then we all got back to enjoying the football as the ignoramiti knew we would, the game too chaotically, joyously puerile and affirming for its own and our own good. How can we possibly excise it from our souls when it bestows upon us the unbridled wildness of Wednesday‚Äôs behaviour, as it also did during the last round of midweek fixtures? The campaign for a fully night-time Premier League begins here. Continue reading...

items.title: Dolphins fire head coach McDaniel
items.summary: Mike McDaniel has become the NFL's latest postseason coaching casualty after he was relieved of his duties by the Miami Dolphins.

items.title: The PL players free to negotiate a transfer with foreign clubs in January
items.summary: A number of Premier League stars have entered the final six months of their deals and can now negotiate pre-contract agreements with foreign clubs.

items.title: 'A gift I can't repay' - McDonald on playing with brother's kidney
items.summary: Five years after receiving a kidney from his brother, Exeter midfielder Kevin McDonald is preparing to face Manchester City in the FA Cup.

items.title: What is Man Utd's 'DNA' and does it really matter?
items.summary: As Manchester United look for Ruben Amorim's successor, Phil McNulty asks if a club's so-called "DNA" is actually relevant?

items.title: Mourinho makes Benfica players sleep at training ground
items.summary: Jose Mourinho takes his players to stay at Benfica's training ground after they lose against Braga in the League Cup semi-final.
